Author: theselumpz
Text: Me too :/   Weighting myself is very ritualistic and I can't stop. I've been feeling good lately (ED wise) and I still cannot not weight myself in the morning and everytime I'm close to a scale.  I've been at home for a week and I don't have a scale here so unfortunately I fell back in my old ED habits. Just in case. I hate this mentality.

Author: songfireleaf
Text: You're not alone there. Lots of love to you.
